summary: Comprehensive testing of KasaBurger Dealer Portal completed. All core features working correctly: Login, Products, Cart, Order Creation, Orders List, Campaigns. Backend 100% pass rate (11/11 tests). Frontend UI fully functional.

minor.issue: Accepts empty cart (items: []) and creates order with 0 total. Frontend validates this, so not critical.

issues: All 201 products grouped under 'Diğer' category because products don't have category field set. This is expected behavior based on data, not a bug.

passed_tests: Dealer Login - MEKGRUP / Mekgrup2024 credentials work
Products Pricing - Campaign discount (15%) applied correctly
Cart - Add to cart functionality works
Order Creation - 'Sipariş Ver' button creates order successfully
Credit Limit - Warning shown when limit exceeded
Orders List - 'Son Siparişlerim' shows all orders
critical_code_review_comments: Backend accepts empty cart orders - consider adding validation in DealerOrderCreate model
Products don't have category field populated - all show under 'Diğer'. This is data issue, not code issue.
seed_data_creation: Created test orders SIP-000006 through SIP-000010 during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Dealer Portal fully functional. Login with MEKGRUP/Mekgrup2024. Products load with 15% campaign discount. Orders created go to pending_approval status due to credit limit. All CRUD operations working. Category grouping shows 'Diğer' because products lack category data.
